title: Eazy Lazy Meatballs (Meat)
directions: In a bowl, combine meat with eggs, bread crumbs and spices.
In a pot, combine the sauces. Place over medium heat. Cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Form the meat mixture into balls the size walnuts.
Carefully add the meatballs to the pot.
Cover the pot and cook on low for 40 minutes.
ingredients: 1/2 cup bread crumbs or matzo meal
